name: IPC's Blue Skidoo - Yamakippa Yokai from Epic Story Matsu
description:
The Genesis Mint is the first to come from the fantastical story world of MATSU created by the award-winning poet, professional storyteller, illustrator, painter, and filmmaker known as iPaintCreatures (IPC). IPC is a professional multidisciplinary artist with several years of experience working with Lucasfilm, Apple Computers, Microsoft Corporation, and Intel. Currently, IPC is producing the first-ever audio cartoon troupe. The FunkyiPuppets.
 
Get ready for iPaintCreatures’ MATSU Story World, CryptoCreatures, CryptoGami MATSU Yokai, and a collection of concept art created as character and creature designs for the FunkyiPuppets and the animated stories of MATSU.
